ValidationRule.description: If ‘Who is Paying’ = Paychex, then the ‘Delivery Company’ must be UPS
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISPICKVAL( Who_Is_Paying__c , "Paychex" ), !ISPICKVAL( Delivery_Company__c ,"UPS" ), RecordType.Name = "401k Overnight Request" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Delivery Company must be UPS when Who is Paying = Paychex
